condition.title: Problem
condition.p: The transformation fails due to Access to file:/tmp/chemistry-temp/ denied (commonly responsible for such failures).

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This usually happens on Linux systems when the user executing the transformation does not have the necessary permissions for the /tmp directory.

steps-informal.p: If the userâ€™s access cannot be modified, you can run the scenario by setting the chemistry.security.workspace parameter to a different directory.
